mapper.select: SELECT m.TABLEID, m.NAME, m.ORDERID, m.DBTABLENAME, m.TABLETYPE, m.ISSHOW, m.ISTASK, m.APPID, m.REMARK, m.SUITID, su.SUITNAME, m.DEALTYPE, m.ISRESERVED, m.INPUTLVL, m.ISADD, m.SHORTTITLE, m.EXTPROP, m.BGTLVL, m.SECUSQL, m.INITSQL, m.INITSQLTIME, m.ISSUMTAB, m.ISMAN, m.MAINUPTAB, m.RELATAB, m.TABSWHERE, m.ISPARTITION, m.ISBAK, m.ISALLDISTRICT, m.INITSQLBTNNAME,m.ISEXCELIMP,m.isReadOnly,m.DESCFILE, (SELECT ATTACHNAME FROM PUB_T_ATTACH WHERE ATTACHID = DESCFILE) FILENAME, (select DEALNAME from dict_t_dealtype where DEALID = m.DEALTYPE AND (APPID = m.APPID OR APPID='*')) AS DEALNAME FROM dict_t_model m,dict_t_suit su where m.SUITID = su.SUITID

SELECT m.TABLEID, m.NAME, m.ORDERID, m.DBTABLENAME, m.TABLETYPE, NVL(m.ISSHOW,'1') AS ISSHOW, NVL(m.ISTASK,'0') AS ISTASK, m.APPID, m.REMARK, m.SUITID, su.SUITNAME, m.DEALTYPE, m.ISRESERVED, m.INPUTLVL, NVL(m.ISADD, '0') AS ISADD, m.SHORTTITLE, m.EXTPROP, m.BGTLVL, m.SECUSQL, m.INITSQL, m.INITSQLTIME, NVL(m.ISSUMTAB,'0') AS ISSUMTAB, m.ISMAN, m.MAINUPTAB, m.RELATAB, m.TABSWHERE, NVL(m.ISPARTITION,'0') AS ISPARTITION, NVL(m.ISBAK,'0') AS ISBAK, NVL(m.ISALLDISTRICT,'0') AS ISALLDISTRICT, NVL(m.ISALLYEAR,'0') AS ISALLYEAR, m.INITSQLBTNNAME, m.ISEXCELIMP, m.isReadOnly, m.DESCFILE, (SELECT ATTACHNAME FROM PUB_T_ATTACH WHERE ATTACHID = DESCFILE) FILENAME, (select DEALNAME from dict_t_dealtype where DEALID = m.DEALTYPE AND (APPID = m.APPID OR APPID='*')) AS DEALNAME, (select ORIGINALXLSXNAME from dict_t_modelexcel where tableid = m.tableid) AS ORIGINALXLSXNAME, m.isSaveFormula FROM dict_t_model m,dict_t_suit su
m.SUITID =su.SUITID AND m.TABLEID = #{tableid}

SELECT m.TABLEID, m.NAME, m.ORDERID, m.DBTABLENAME, m.TABLETYPE, m.ISSHOW, m.ISTASK, m.APPID, m.REMARK, m.SUITID, su.SUITNAME, m.DEALTYPE, m.ISRESERVED, m.INPUTLVL, m.ISADD, m.SHORTTITLE, m.EXTPROP, m.BGTLVL, m.SECUSQL, m.INITSQL, m.INITSQLTIME, m.ISSUMTAB, m.ISMAN, m.MAINUPTAB, m.RELATAB, m.TABSWHERE, m.ISPARTITION, m.ISBAK, m.ISALLDISTRICT, m.ISALLYEAR, m.ISEXCELIMP, m.isReadOnly, m.INITSQLBTNNAME, m.DESCFILE, (SELECT ATTACHNAME FROM PUB_T_ATTACH WHERE ATTACHID = DESCFILE) FILENAME, (select DEALNAME from dict_t_dealtype where DEALID = m.DEALTYPE AND (APPID = m.APPID OR APPID='*')) AS DEALNAME, m.isSaveFormula FROM dict_t_model m,dict_t_suit su
m.SUITID =su.SUITID AND m.DBTABLENAME = #{dbtablename}
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM CDT_T_TASKTYPEMODEL t WHERE t.MODELID = '${tableID}'
